About CA Harvest
================================ CA Harvest Software Change Manager is a software tool for the configuration management (revision control, SCM, etc.) of source code and other software development assets.
About Automic's CA Harvest Package ================================
Automate the usage of harvest commands through various actions. These actions are basic building blocks to achieve a specific business goal. *Create Package *Get Package *Promote Package *Demote Package *Checkout Local
=Supported Harvest versions= * Harvest v12.6
=Limitations= * No known limitations.
=Setup= * Oracle JRE 1.7 or higher must be installed on Agent OS and "java" must be set as executable on the same. * Actions must run on the same machine where the Harvest Client is installed. * Verify that the CA_SCM_HOME Environment variable is set to Harvest Client Install directory
=Variables= (none)
=Common Input= -Broker*: Specify the hostname of the Harvest Broker. E.g. vviehrv01 -Port*: Specify the port number of the Harvest Broker. The default port is 5101. Port range is 1 to 65536. -Username*: Specify the username to connect to the Harvest Broker. E.g. harvest -Password*: Specify the password to connect to the Harvest Broker.
=Actions= Following actions are supported for Harvest.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HARVEST.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_PACKAGE * Action Description: This action creates a new change package in a given Harvest project.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HARVEST.PUB.ACTION.DEMOTE_PACKAGE * Action Description: This action demotes the package to revert back my promoted package for the required change.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HARVEST.PUB.ACTION.PROMOTE_PACKAGE * Action Description: This action promotes the mentioned change package(s) from the given from-state to to-state.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.ACTION.CHECKOUT_LOCAL * Action Description: This action helps to get files from the repository to the local directory.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HARVEST.PUB.ACTION.GET_PACKAGE * Action Description: This action gets the package details in a given Harvest project.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.ACTION.GET_VERSION * Action Description: This action retrieves the version details of a Harvest item.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.ACTION.CHECKIN_LOCAL * Action Description: This action helps to check in local file(s) to the Harvest repository.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.ACTION.CHECKOUT_BY_AGENT * Action Description: This action checks out files from a Harvest repository to a host accessed by the specified agent.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.ACTION.CHECKIN_BY_AGENT * Action Description: This action checks in file(s) to the Harvest repository using a specified file agent.
* Action Name:PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.ACTION.TAKE_SNAPSHOT * Action Description: This action takes a snapshot for a given project with the latest versions in the view.
